div.p: Imagine your life in 10 years time. What will it look like?
In 10 years, I will be young pensioner. I will have 64 years.
First, I hope my children to have also children. I will be grandfather then.
Second, I will travel with my wife to discover center of Africa. We shoud like to visit Rwanda en Tanzania to see the gorillas en de bigs five.
I always very interested to visit a lot of differents peoples with other cultures
After this, I shoud like to gardening to have vegetables et beautifull flowers. I shoud like also to give a part of my time to help other persons with difficulty in her life.
Finally, this is how I see my life in 10 years.
